properties.areaDesc: Greenup, KY; Lawrence, OH; Boyd, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 10:39AM EST until February 16 at 3:11PM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Charleston WV has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Ohio...Kentucky...

Ohio River At Ashland affecting Greenup and Boyd counties in
Kentucky.

Ohio River at Ashland affecting Lawrence County Ohio.

For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast.

The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Ohio River At Ashland.
* From Thursday afternoon to Sunday afternoon.
* At 10:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 48.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 52.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early
tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 54.3 feet Friday evening. It will
then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning.
* Impact...At 55.5 feet, Route 3 is flooded at Catlettsburg.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 54.2
feet on 09/20/2004.
properties.instruction:
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.

Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Please report Severe Weather to the National Weather Service by
calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely. You may
also report severe weather by posting your report to the Charleston
West Virginia National Weather Service Facebook Page, or by using
the Twitter Hashtag, NWSRLX.

Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx.

The next statement will be issued this evening at 1045 PM EST or
sooner if necessary.
